thread.title: From belligerent bantamweight to gentler giant: 20 years of DTCC abroad
thread.title_full: From belligerent bantamweight to gentler giant: 20 years of DTCC abroad

author: Financial News
title: From belligerent bantamweight to gentler giant: 20 years of DTCC abroad
text:
From belligerent bantamweight to gentler giant: 20 years of DTCC abroad By James Rundle 28 September 2015, Newspaper: Issue967 It is 20 years since Bill Hodash stepped out of the lift on the 13th floor of a skyscraper at 1 Undershaft, in the City of London, and walked into his new office.
